sense.def: Alternative Names qi bing 奇病 , strange disease; qi ji 奇疾 , strange ailment; guai ji 怪疾 , queer ailment; yi ji 異疾 , unusual ailment; guai zheng 怪證 , queer condition; guai zheng 怪症 . Pathological Condition Combined Designation of rarely seen diseases with odd signs. Yi xue gang mu 醫學綱目 21: 水丸梧子意須斟，除 驅怪病安心志 , “Water pills [the size of] wu zi must be considered. They eliminate queer diseases and calm heart and mind”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 quotes its data on “ queer disease” . mostly from the Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 .
